Teeratep WinothaiIndex 0: On 24 December 2005, at Phang Nga, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Latvia in the 2005 King's Cup, resulting in a 1–1 draw.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 1: On 26 March 2006, at Chonburi, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against the Philippines in a friendly match, winning 5–0.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 4: On 6 February 2008, at Saitama, Japan, Teeratep Winothai played against Japan in the 2010 FIFA World Cup Qualification, resulting in a 4–1 loss.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 5: On 15 March 2008, at Kunming, China, Teeratep Winothai played against China PR in a friendly match, resulting in a 3–3 draw.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 8: On 20 May 2008, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Nepal in a friendly match, winning 7–0.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 9: On 25 May 2008, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Iraq in a friendly match, winning 2–1.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 10: On 2 June 2008, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Bahrain in the 2010 FIFA World Cup Qualification, resulting in a 2–3 loss.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 11: On 20 December 2008, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Indonesia in the 2008 AFF Suzuki Cup, winning 2–1.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 12: On 18 July 2009, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Pakistan in a friendly match, winning 4–0.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 16: On 26 January 2013, at Chiangmai, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against North Korea in the 2013 King's Cup, resulting in a 2–2 draw.
Teeratep WinothaiIndex 17: On 5 March 2014, at Bangkok, Thailand, Teeratep Winothai played against Lebanon in the 2015 AFC Asian Cup qualification, resulting in a 2–5 loss.
